## ReadableMosaic.getMEURBalance() method

Get the amount of MEUR held by an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMEURBalance(address?: string): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
